title: Warranty cover in India on Google 3A XL for phones purchased from USA
content: I am getting a new Google 3A XL from USA through a relative. It will be used permanently in India. Will the warranty cover be available in India, even when it's purchased from USA? I have read a few posts saying that the warranty covers "country from where the phone was purchased". Couldn't really find an answer in Google warranty terms and conditions. Can anyone assist?
